original_text: Then it goes and takes seven other spirits more wicked than itself, and they go in and live there. And the final condition of that person is worse than the first.”
korean_text: 이에 가서 저보다 더 악한 귀신 일곱을 데리고 들어가서 거하니 그 사람의 나중 형편이 전보다 더 심하게 되느니라

sentences.original_text: Then it goes and takes seven other spirits

sentences.korean_translation: 자기보다 더 악한 일곱 귀신을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and they go in and live there
And the final condition of that person
